articles.title: Rafael Devers home run led to benches-clearing brawl between Giants and Rockies
summary: Rafael Devers' home run sparks benches-clearing brawl between Giants and Rockies, drawing attention to sportsmanship in MLB
Devers hits .464 with 5 recent home runs, igniting Rockies pitcher Kyle Freeland's anger during Tuesday's game
Incident highlights tensions in MLB, emphasizing the importance of respect and etiquette in professional sports

articles.title: Review & setlist: Young crowd was head over heels for stunt-filled Benson Boone show at TD Garden
summary: Benson Boone's high-energy show at TD Garden wows young Boston crowd, showcasing his viral fame and stunt-filled performance
Boone's American Heart Tour for sophomore album sold out in 9 seconds, with electrified fans and 7 backflips during the night
Boston's youth captivated by Boone's performance, likely paving the way for more Gen Alpha heartthrobs to grace the city's stages

articles.title: 5 new cast members join ‘SNL’ after high-profile departures
summary: 5 new cast members join 'SNL' amid high-profile exits, injecting fresh talent into the upcoming season
Ben Marshall transitions from writer to featured player, joined by Tommy Brennan, Jeremy Culhane, Kam Patterson, and Veronika Slowikowska
Boston viewers can anticipate a revamped 'SNL' season with new faces and potential changes in the iconic show's dynamics

articles.title: ‘Star Trek’-inspired Connecticut home is listed for $1.4 million
summary: Connecticut 'Star Trek' home, Starcastle, listed for $1.4 million, offers unique futuristic design and history for real estate enthusiasts in New Fairfield
Built in 1985 by owner Ed Roman and architect Roy Mason, the 5,036 sq ft home features spaceship-like domes and a starburst front door
Potential trend in unique home designs may inspire Boston residents to explore unconventional real estate options in the region

articles.title: Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Sept. 3)
summary: Greater Boston sees varied home sales in September, with Acton properties averaging over $1M, impacting local real estate market
Key sales include 6 Candida Lane Colonial for $1,175,000 and 4 Wadsworth St. Colonial in Allston for $1,130,000
High prices in Acton reflect demand for larger homes, while Allston's sales show interest in historic properties despite smaller lot sizes

articles.title: On a night described as a ‘gut punch,’ resilient Red Sox keep on fighting
summary: Red Sox pull off a dramatic 11-7 win despite setbacks, including a key player's potential injury, keeping their winning streak alive
Rookie Roman Anthony may face injured list after oblique injury; ace Garrett Crochet falters in the sixth inning with 3 home runs
Boston fans await updates on Roman Anthony's condition and hope for a quick recovery, while the team adjusts to potential lineup changes
